variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 280% of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 320% of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 400% of ATK to all enemies. Will be auto-cast again if any target is defeated.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 420% of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 480% of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 540% of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.

Deals Magic DMG equal to 600% of ATK to a single target and enters the Deathbringer status for 8s. When the enemy's Health is below 20%, this skill deals double damage. Deathbringer: Dance of Finality deals 30% more damage. Can stack up to 90%.
Enemies take 20% more damage for 5 seconds.
